Headline: Kimball-BOUND trains bypassing Diversey Station
ShortDescription: Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are running, but not stopping at Diversey due to police investigation.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are running, but not stopping at Diversey due to police investigation.

  • For Kimball-bound service from these stations, take a Loop-bound train to Fullerton and transfer to a Kimball-bound train.
  • For Kimball-bound service to these stations, take a Kimball-bound train to Wellington and transfer to Loop-bound train.

We apologize for this inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.
